solution_line_template: The rest of his family had a total of {total_cyrus_bites}/{family_bites_divisor} = <<{total_cyrus_bites}/{family_bites_divisor}={total_family_bites}>>{total_family_bites} mosquito bites.
Each family member had {total_family_bites}/{num_family_members} = <<{total_family_bites}/{num_family_members}={bites_per_family_member}>>{bites_per_family_member} mosquito bites.
